front.title: Direct Hit
front.gametext: Add X to one weapon destiny (before weapon destiny is drawn) when targeting a combat vehicle.USED: X = 1.  LOST: X = 3.
front.lore: Snowspeeders move much faster than AT-AT cannons can track, but if approaching on a poor attack vector, the snowspeeder is at the mercy of the well-trained AT-AT gunner.
